channel.title: Golang Microservices on Edwin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang Microservices on Edwin's Blog

item.title: Enable DynamoDB in a local environment with LocalStack and Golang
item.description: In this post I invite you to build an API with Golang programming language and use the DynamoDB service. But all in our Local environment. Trust me ? zero cost for using AWS Cloud Services, let’s get started ! AWS and Localstack Many times we need to test an AWS service without spending our time in infrastructure and without having to incur in expenses, we must have a tool that allows us to create a local environment and thus be able to perform the necessary tests in a homologous way as we do in our cloud provider, in this case, AWS Services.
